A view of the United Nations flag outside the General Assembly Hall during the general debate of the General Assembly' UN Photo / Loey Felipe

# 2025 Calendar of Selected United Nations Events

### UN FOCUS

* [Secretary-General briefs General Assembly on 2025 priorities](https://www.un.org/sg/en/content/sg/statement/2025-01-15/secretary-generals-address-the-general-assembly-his-priorities-for-2025-bilingual-delivered-scroll-down-for-all-english-and-all-french), 15 January
* [ECOSOC Coordination segment](https://ecosoc.un.org/en/what-we-do/ecosoc-coordination-segment/2025/2025-coordination-segment) (DESA), 6-7 February
* [Committee for Development Policy](https://www.un.org/development/desa/dpad/our-work/committee-for-development-policy.html) (DESA), 24-28 February
* [Opening: World Expo 2025 Osaka](https://www.expo2025.or.jp/en/), 13 April – 13 October
* [UN Charter Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/un-day), 26 June
* [25th Anniversary of UN Global Compact](https://unglobalcompact.org/), 26 July
* [UN Special Day at World Expo 2025 Osaka](https://www.expo2025.or.jp/en/), 26 August
* [80th UNGA High-Level Week (UNHQ New York)](https://www.un.org/en/ga/), 23-29 September
* [UN Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/un-day), 24 October

### SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS

* [International Day of Education](https://www.unesco.org/en/days/education#:~:text=About%20the%20International%20Day%20of,education%20for%20peace%20and%20development.) (UNESCO), 24 January
* [International Day of Clean Energy](https://www.un.org/en/observances/clean-energy-day#:~:text=The%20International%20Day%20of%20Clean,of%20people%20and%20the%20planet.) (UNHQ New York), 26 January
* [ECOSOC Partnership Forum](https://sdgs.un.org/2025ECOSOCPartnershipForum) (ECOSOC), 5 February
* [International Day of Women & Girls in Science](https://www.un.org/en/observances/women-and-girls-in-science-day) (UNESCO), 11 February
* [Asia-Pacific Forum on Sustainable Development (ESCAP](https://www.unescap.org/events/apfsd12)), 25-28 February
* [World Wildlife Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/world-wildlife-day) (UNEP), 3 March
* [International Women's Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/womens-day) (UN Women), 8 March
* [Commission on the Status of Women](https://www.unwomen.org/en/how-we-work/commission-on-the-status-of-women) (UN Women), 10-21 March
* [Nutrition for Growth Summit](https://nutritionforgrowth.org/) (WFP, UNICEF), 27-28 March
* [International Day of Sport for Development and Peace](https://www.un.org/en/observances/sport-day), 6 April
* [World Health Day](https://www.who.int/campaigns/world-health-day) (WHO), 7 April
* [Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development](http://Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development) (ECA), 9-11 April
* [Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific](https://www.unescap.org/events/apfsd12) (ESCAP), 21-25 April
* [International Girls in ICT Day](https://www.itu.int/women-and-girls/girls-in-ict/) (UN Women), 24 April
* [World Press Freedom Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/press-freedom-day), 3 May
* [World Health Assembly](https://www.who.int/about/governance/world-health-assembly) (WHO), 19-27 May
* [ECOSOC Operational Activities for Development Segment](https://ecosoc.un.org/en/events/2025/operational-activities-development-segment) (ECOSOC), 20-22 May
* [Africa Dialogue Series](https://www.un.org/osaa/ads), May (TBD)
* [World Environment Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/environment-day) (UNEP), 5 June
* [World Oceans Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/oceans-day) (UNESCO), 8 June
* [UN Ocean Conference](https://sdgs.un.org/conferences/ocean2025), 9-13 June
* [World Refugee Day](https://www.unhcr.org/us/get-involved/take-action/world-refugee-day) (UNHCR), 20 June
* [Announcement of Young Leaders for the SDGs 2025](https://www.un.org/youthenvoy/about-the-young-leaders-for-the-sdgs/) (UN Youth Office) June (TBD)
* [International Conference on Financing for Development](https://financing.desa.un.org/ffd4) (DESA), 30 June – 3 July
* [High-level Political Forum on Sustainable Development](https://hlpf.un.org/2025) (DESA), 14-18, 21-23 July
* [International Youth Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/youth-day) (DESA, UN Youth Office), 12 August
* [World Humanitarian Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/humanitarian-day) (OCHA), 19 August
* [International Day of Awareness of Food Loss and Waste](https://www.un.org/en/observances/nd-food-waste-day) (FAO, UNEP), 29 September
* [UNGA SDG Media Zone](https://www.un.org/en/sdgmediazone), TBD
* [World Food Forum](https://www.world-food-forum.org/) (FAO), 13-17 September
* [10th Anniversary of the SDGs](https://www.un.org/sustainabledevelopment/), 25 September TBD
* [World Food Day](https://www.fao.org/world-food-day/en), 80th anniversary celebration of FAO (FAO, IFAD, WFP), 16 October
* [International Day for the Eradication of Poverty](https://www.un.org/en/observances/day-for-eradicating-poverty), 17 October
* [World Cities Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/cities-day) (UN-Habitat), 31 October
* [World Summit on Social Development](https://social.desa.un.org/second-world-summit-for-social-development) (DESA), 4-6 November
* [World Toilet Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/toilet-day) (UN-Water, UNICEF), 19 November
* [World Children's Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/world-childrens-day) (UNICEF), 20 November
* [International Migrants Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/migrants-day) (IOM), 18 December

### MOBILIZING CLIMATE ACTION

* [International Year of Glaciers Preservation](https://www.un-glaciers.org/en) (UNESCO, WMO), 21 January
* [International Day of Clean Energy](https://www.un.org/en/observances/clean-energy-day#:~:text=The%20International%20Day%20of%20Clean,of%20people%20and%20the%20planet.) (UNEP), 26 January
* [UN Biodiversity Conference](https://www.cbd.int/article/reconvene-cop16-rome-2024) (FAO, UNEP), 25-27 February
* [Sustainable Energy for All Global Forum](https://www.seforall.org/forum) (SE4All), 12-13 March
* [International Day of Forests](https://www.un.org/en/observances/forests-and-trees-day), 21 March
* [World Day of Glaciers](https://www.un-glaciers.org/en/world-day-glaciers#:~:text=%C2%A9%20Daniel%20Kordan-,World%20Day%20for%20Glaciers%20%2D%2021%20March%202025,to%20reinforce%20achievements%20of%20humanity.) (Debut) (UN Water, UNESCO, WMO), 21 March
* [World Water Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/water-day) (UNESCO, UN-Water), 22 March
* [International Day of Zero Waste](https://www.un.org/en/observances/zero-waste-day) (UNEP), 30 March
* [Conference to the Basel (COP17)](https://www.basel.int/TheConvention/ConferenceoftheParties/Meetings/COP17/tabid/9743/Default.aspx), [Rotterdam (COP12)](https://www.pic.int/TheConvention/ConferenceoftheParties/Meetings/COP12/tabid/9745/language/en-US/Default.aspx) & [Stockholm (COP12)](https://www.pops.int/TheConvention/ConferenceoftheParties/Meetings/COP12/tabid/9744/Default.aspx) Conventions, 28 April – 9 May
* [UN Forum on Forests](https://www.un.org/esa/forests/forum/index.html) (DESA), 5-9 May
* [World Environment Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/environment-day) (UNEP), 5 June
* [UN Ocean Conference](https://sdgs.un.org/conferences/ocean2025), 9-13 June
* [World Habitat Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/habitat-day) (UN-HABITAT), 7 October
* [COP30](https://sdg.iisd.org/events/2025-un-climate-change-conference-unfccc-cop-30/) (UNFCCC), 10-21 November
* [UN Environnent Assembly](https://www.unep.org/environmentassembly/) (UNEA-7), 8-12 December

### HUMAN RIGHTS

* [International Day Commemoration in Memory of Victims of the Holocaust](https://www.un.org/en/holocaustremembrance/observance) (UNHQ New York), 27 January
* [International Day of Zero Tolerance for Female Genital Mutilation](https://www.un.org/en/observances/female-genital-mutilation-day) (UNFPA), 6 February
* [Human Rights Council](https://www.ohchr.org/en/hrbodies/hrc/home) (OHCHR), 24 February - 4 April
* [International Women's Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/womens-day) (UN Women), 8 March
* [Commission on the Status of Women](https://www.unwomen.org/en/how-we-work/commission-on-the-status-of-women/csw69-2025) (UN Women), 10-21 March
* [International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-racism-day), 21 March
* [International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and the Transatlantic Slave Trade](https://www.un.org/en/observances/transatlantic-slave-trade) (UNHQ, New York), 25 March
* [Permanent Forum on People of African Descent](https://www.ohchr.org/en/permanent-forum-people-african-descent) (OHCHR), 16-19 April
* [Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issue](https://social.desa.un.org/issues/indigenous-peoples/unpfii/24th-session)s (DESA), 21 April – 2 May
* [World Press Freedom Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/press-freedom-day) (UNESCO), 3 May
* [Conference on Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities](https://social.desa.un.org/cosp/18th-session) (DESA), 10-13 June
* [Human Rights Council](https://www.ohchr.org/en/hrbodies/hrc/home) (HRC), 16 June – 11July
* [International Day for Countering Hate Speech](https://www.un.org/en/observances/countering-hate-speech), 18 June
* [International Day of Reflection & Commemoration of Genocide in Srebrenica](https://www.un.org/en/observances/srebrenica-genocide-commemoration-day/messages#:~:text=11%20July%20marks%20the%20first,remains%20buried%20in%20mass%20graves.), 11 July
* [International Day of the World’s Indigenous Peoples](https://www.un.org/en/observances/indigenous-day), 9 August
* [Human Rights Council](https://www.ohchr.org/en/hrbodies/hrc/home) (HRC), 8 September - 3 October
* [International Day to End Impunity for Crimes against Journalists](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-impunity-crimes-against-journalists) (UNESCO, DGC), 2 November
* [International Day for Elimination of Violence against Women](https://www.un.org/en/observances/ending-violence-against-women-day) (UN Women), 25 November
* [World AIDS Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/world-aids-day) (UNAIDS), 1 December
* [International Day of Persons with Disabilities](https://www.un.org/en/observances/day-of-persons-with-disabilities), 3 December
* [Human Rights Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/human-rights-day) (OHCHR), 10 December

### PEACE & SECURITY

* [International Day for Disarmament and Non-Proliferation Awareness](https://www.un.org/en/observances/disarmament-non-proliferation-awareness-day) (ODA), 5 March
* [International Day for Mine Awareness and Assistance in Mine Action](https://www.un.org/en/observances/mine-awareness-day) (UNMAS), 4 April
* [International Day of Multilateralism and Diplomacy for Peace](https://www.un.org/en/observances/multilateralism-for-peace-day) (DPPA), 24 April
* [UN Peacekeeping Ministerial Meeting](https://peacekeeping.un.org/en/united-nations-peacekeeping-ministerial-2025) (DPO) 13-14 May
* [International Day of UN Peacekeepers](https://www.un.org/en/observances/peacekeepers-day) (DPO), 29 May
* [International Day for Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-sexual-violence-in-conflict-day), 19 June
* [International day against Drug Abuse & Illicit Trafficking](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-drug-abuse-day) (UNODC), 26 June
* [World Day Against Trafficking in Persons](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-human-trafficking-day) (UNODC), 30 July
* [International Day of Peace](https://www.un.org/en/observances/international-day-peace) (UNHQ New York), 21 September
* [International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons](https://www.un.org/en/observances/nuclear-weapons-elimination-day) (ODA), 26 September
* [Disarmament Week](https://www.un.org/en/observances/disarmament-week) (ODA), 24-30 October
* 25th anniversary of Security Council Resolution 1325 on Women, Peace & Security (DPO), 31 October
* [International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People](https://www.un.org/en/observances/international-day-of-solidarity-with-the-palestinian-people) (DPPA), 29 November
* [International Anti-Corruption Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/anti-corruption-day), (UNODC), 9 December
* 10th anniversary of Security Council Resolution 2250 on Youth, Peace & Security (UN Youth Office), 9 December

### RESPONDING TO CRISIS AND CONFLICT

* [Five years since WHO declared COVID-19 a global pandemic](https://www.who.int/), 11 March
* [UN Peacekeeping Ministerial Meeting](https://peacekeeping.un.org/en/united-nations-peacekeeping-ministerial-2025) (DPO) 13-14 May
* SG report on Children and Armed Conflict and Open Debate at the Security Council, May (TBD)
* [Protection of Civilians Week](https://www.unocha.org/events/protection-civilians-week) (OCHA), May (TBD)
* [Global Platform for Disaster Risk Reduction](https://globalplatform.undrr.org/) (UNDRR), 2-6 June
* [International Day for Elimination of Sexual Violence in Conflict](https://www.un.org/en/observances/end-sexual-violence-in-conflict-day), 19 June
* [World Refugee Day](https://www.unhcr.org/us/get-involved/take-action/world-refugee-day) (UNHCR), 20 June
* [World Humanitarian Day](https://www.un.org/en/observances/humanitarian-day) (OCHA), 19 August
* [International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons](https://www.un.org/en/observances/nuclear-weapons-elimination-day) (ODA), 26 September
* Global Humanitarian Overview & [CERF High- Level Pledging Conference](https://cerf.un.org/event/high-level-conference/high-level-pledging-event-central-emergency-response-fund-2025) (20th anniversary of CERF) (OCHA), December (TBD)

### MAKING THE CASE FOR MULTILATERAL COOPERATION—THE UN AT 80

* [Commission for Social Development](https://social.desa.un.org/csocd/63rd-session) (DESA), 10-14 February
* [ECOSOC Partnership Forum](https://sdgs.un.org/2025ECOSOCPartnershipForum) (ECOSOC), 5 February
* [ECOSOC Development Cooperation Forum](https://financing.desa.un.org/what-we-do/ECOSOC/development-cooperation-forum/DCF-home) (DESA), 12-13 March
* [Least Developed Countries Future Forum](https://www.un.org/ohrlls/ldc-future-forum-2025) (OHRLLS), 1-3 April
* [ECOSOC Youth Forum](https://ecosoc.un.org/en/what-we-do/ecosoc-youth-forum/about-youth-forum/ecosoc-youth-forum-2025) (DESA), 15-17 March
* [International Day of Multilateralism and Diplomacy for Peace](https://www.un.org/en/observances/multilateralism-for-peace-day), 24 April
* [World Bank–IMF Spring meetings](https://www.worldbank.org/en/meetings/splash/spring) (WB, IMF), 25-27 April
* [UN Conference for the Landlocked Developing Countries](https://www.un.org/en/landlocked) (OHRLLS), May (TBD)
* [G7 Summit](https://www.g7italy.it/en/summit/), June (TBD)
* [International Day for South-South Cooperation](https://www.un.org/en/observances/south-south-cooperation-day), 12 September
* [80th UNGA High-Level Week](https://www.un.org/en/ga/) (UNHQ New York), 23-29 September
* [World Bank–IMF annual meetings](https://www.worldbank.org/en/meetings/splash/annual) (WB, IMF) 17-19 October
* UN-AU Annual Conference, November (TBD)
* [G20 Summit](https://g20.org/), 22-23 November

### 

### List of acronyms

**CBD COP 16** - Convention on Biological Diversity Conference of the Parties

**CERF** - Central Emergency Response Fund

**DESA** - Department of Economic and Social Affairs

**DGC** - Department of Global Communications

**DPO** - Department of Peace Operations

**DPPA** - Department of Political and Peacebuilding Affairs

**EC** - European Commission

**ECOSOC** - Economic and Social Council

**FAO** - Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations

**HRC** - Human Rights Council

**IFAD -** International Fund for Agricultural Development

**IMF** - International Monetary Fund

**IOM** - International Organization for Migration

**OCHA** - Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

**ODA** - Office for Disarmament Affairs

**OHCHR** - Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights

**OSGEY** - Office of the Secretary-General's Envoy on Youth

**SDG** - Sustainable Development Goals

**SIDS4 -** 4th International Conference on Small Island Developing States

**SRSG/SVC -** Office of the Special Representative of the Secretary-General on Sexual Violence in Conflict

**UN Habitat** - United Nations Human Settlements Programme

**UN Women** - United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women

**UNAIDS** - Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS

**UNDP** - United Nations Development Programme

**UNEP** - United Nations Environment Programme

**UNESCO** - United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

**UNFCCC** - United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

**UNFPA** - United Nations Population Fund

**UNGA** - General Assembly of the United Nations

**UNHCR** - United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

**UNHQ New York** - United Nations Headquarters in New York

**UNICEF** - United Nations Children's Fund

**UNMAS** - United Nations Mine Action Service

**UNODC** - United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime

**UN-OHRLLS** - United Nations Office of the High Representative for the Least Developed Countries, Landlocked Developing Countries and Small Island Developing States

**WB** - World Bank

**WFP** - World Food Program

**WHO** - World Health Organization

**WMO** - World Meteorological Organization
